entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Request] Dotnet Host Should Support Programmatic Installation Architecture Scans #108503
  • `dotnet --info` returns an incorrect value for x86 SDK with Non Native Host #108502
  • Unactionable trim warning on class with attribute that has RUC ctor #108501
  • .NET 8: String interpolation with IPAddress has breaking change #108491
  • Testing WASI code outside of the current repo #108490
  • Last() throws an exception when applied on a concatenation of a collection with two empty collections #108477
  • exePath_UserLevelNone failing when testing against source-build config #108476
    10.0.0
  • ARM64 GC: Use SVE when sorting the mark list #108473
    10.0.0
  • [mono] Use newer clang to build emscripten dependencies #108472
    10.0.0
  • Guarded devirtualization generates checks that are never true #108471
  • FileStream Not Suppressing Finalization on Dispose Call #108465

Closed

  • [Perf] Multiple platforms: Regressions in System.Reflection #108445
    10.0.0
  • [9.0] System.Security.Cryptography.Tests native crash in RSAOpenSsl: !newKey.IsInvalid assert failure #107929
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: ARM64 SVE: Add signed versions of the CreateWhileLessThanMask APIs #108384
    10.0.0
  • Port System.Net docs for .NET 9 APIs #106789
    9.0.0
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException: The parameter is incorrect. #108322
    10.0.0
  • PosixSignalRegistration.Create hangs debugger on MacOS (Rider & VSCode) #106194

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix differences between bash and cmd versions of crossgen test script #108500
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108499
    area-System.Globalization
  • ILLink: Avoid warning for RUC field rooted as part of a root assembly #108498
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use a more exact base class for considerGuardedDevirtualization #108497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108496
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #108495
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix ILLink behavior for modreq types #108494
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Use edge weights in `LinearScan::findPredBlockForLiveIn` #108493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Work in Progress] Fix an issue with the last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #108492
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Simplify IsComObjectType checks #108487
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix LINQ Last() in ConcatNIterator to also check base case (Concat2Iterator) #108486
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Interpreter Fixes #108485
    area-VM-coreclr
  • feat: add StringSyntax for KeyReference URI parameters #108484
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix `InlineArray` swift lowering in mono #108483
    Servicing-approved, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • Improve software exception handling performance #108480
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Added DateOnly overload methods to IsoWeek #108479
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix rooting JSWebWorkerInstance #108475
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use default timeout for launching the browser in WBT #108474
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0] Fix devirtualization across genericness in the hierarchy #108470
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [MonoVM] Fix assert on startup with abcrem optimization enabled #108469
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update field references in properties - testing only #108468
    NO-MERGE
  • [release/9.0] Update System.Formats.Nrbf ref sources and restore package description #108467
    Servicing-consider, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Fix wrong Region Info Names #108466
    area-System.Globalization

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.36 #108462
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 8.0.11 #108463
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Don't bail out on side-effects in assertionprop #108418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add instructions to debug CLI builds using VS #108455
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [infra][android Disable Android ARM64 runtime tests job #108439
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • RandomAccess.Write throws System.IO.IOException when buffers total size greater than 2GB #108380
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Update System.Formats.Nrbf ref sources and restore package description #108430
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf

Updated

  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [cdac][cdac-build-tool] Don't let msbuild rewrite the resource name #108296
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • use collection syntax in illink #108458
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] Add DefaultMemberAttribute to Test.CoreLib #108258
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2551310 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update field references in property accessors #108413
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • MSFT:53847109 [.NET Core] DTS / UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups returns PrincipalOperationException: Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212). #108032
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Split the HostApplicationBuilder configuration. #107616
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • JIT: move funclet separation later #108456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update RedHat 7 -> 8 -- release/6.0-staging #105063
    blocking, blocking-clean-ci, area-Infrastructure
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Use VNVisitReachingVNs in more places #108420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108415
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108419
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix IPGlobalProperties.DomainName to return string.Empty when domain name is not set #107241
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Debug missing MicrosoftNetCoreAppRuntimePackDir #107280
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Networking stress tests infrastructure improvements. #108325
    area-System.Net
  • [release/9.0] [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #108294
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Vectorize codegen for left shift operator on byte vector #108336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [aot] mono_aot_split_options: reset state after a backslash #108212
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Allow devirt into abstract classes if we saw a non-abstract child #108379
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Trying to support changing member accessibility #108350
    area-EnC-mono
  • Enable build with Checked option for libraries configuration #108433
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix SIMD class retrieval and type checks #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Share pthread_setname via minipal #108370
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Updated tsaoptions.json to direct issues to runtime owners #108451
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
